Package library.model.command

Class UserLogic

java.lang.Object
library.model.command.UserLogic
public class UserLogic extends Object
Class-util, has only static methods by design. All methods must be related to User entity, like find user, etc. All public methods here must comply with Command signature, as they will be used in CommandContext as lambda-functions and called from Front Controller FrontController

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static String add(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Adds new user to the app. Saves to DB. Preserves user input. Errors are shown in page, if any.
      Parameters:
      req - user request
      Returns:
      home for all users, except admin. for admin, it's users page.

    • login

      public static String login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Logs user in. Check provided login and password against specified in DB. Shows errors if any
      Parameters:
      req - user request
      Returns:
      home page

    • edit

      public static String edit(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req) throws ServiceException
      Edit user. Allowed to all users roles, except UNKNOWN. Every user can edit oneself, only admin can edit other users
      Parameters:
      req - user request
      Returns:
      edit page in case of error, home/users page upon success for all users/admin
      Throws:
      ServiceException - in case current user is null (which should never happen)

    • logout

      public static String logout(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req) throws ServiceException
      Logouts user, invalidates it's session. Saves user preferred language to new session.
      Parameters:
      req - user request
      Returns:
      login page
      Throws:
      ServiceException - in case current user is null (which shouldn't happen)

    • delete

      public static String delete(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req) throws ServiceException, DaoException
      Deletes user by id. User cannot be deleted, if it has fine.
      Parameters:
      req - user request
      Returns:
      last search or users page for admin
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if id isn't provided or user has fine
      DaoException - in case of some DB error

    • find

      public static String find(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req) throws ServiceException
      Finds all users by pattern with pagination.
      Parameters:
      req - user request
      Returns:
      users page
      Throws:
      ServiceException - in case of errors

    • setLang

      public static String setLang(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req) throws ServiceException, DaoException
      Changes current lang for any user: authenticated or not. For authenticated change is saved to DB.
      Parameters:
      req - user request
      Returns:
      page on which user was before changing language
      Throws:
      ServiceException - in case of uninitialized crucial app parameters
      DaoException - in case of DB errors
